pr_title: WebUI Forecast Window hide Calendar, Period, Year

timeline.message:
Add model validator for M_Forecast.DatePromised

It gets the default calendar and sets the forecast's Calendar, Year and Period, if possible.
If not possible error is thrown.

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/3856

Add error messages if default calendar or period does not exist

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/3856

Set Updated and UpdatedBy to the default Calendar

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/3856

Set Updated and UpdatedBy to the default Calendar 2

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/3856

ForecastLine Quick Input: copy warehouse from Forecast
